short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helpful, counting trio. Includes a tally counter, stopwatch, and timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click anywhere or use your spacebar or enter key to keep a tally count. Start, stop, and reset a stopwatch measuring a detailed time. Add your own time up to one hour to start a countdown timer.
